section.title: Test Coverage Reports
section.p: These are test coverage reports for Cactus. They were generated using Clover. They show how good (or how bad) the Cactus tests suite is.

ul.li: Cactus uses AspectJ and thus the coverage report is run on the code as modified by AspectJ. This explains why code formatting is less than perfect and why you may notice some strange method names (they are introduced by AspectJ).

td.link: Test coverage for Cactus for J2EE 1.3
